content: a 7 crown 84 total stitches for smaller sizes follow sizing guide for head circumference slip_stitch to join chain 1 counts as first half_double_crochet for next round make sure to stop at the round that matches the size in the sizing guide for a better fit sides of the hat round 8 *stitch count will vary based on size of head so count will vary and need to be determined but does not need much counting until brim for increases half_double_crochet in back loop only in each stitch around increase every 6th stitch 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 5 stitches and 2 half_double_crochet in the 6th stitch slip_stitch to join chain 4 counts as first double_crochet for next round round 9 perforated round chain 4 counts as double_crochet + chain 1 skip next stitch double_crochet in the following stitch chain 1 *you should be stitching into the top of the double_crochet from the previous round repeat this around slip_stitch to the 3rd chain on the chain 4 to join repeat round 9 for 5 more rounds 6 total row for the sides of the hat brim round 10 chain 2 not counting as a stitch for this round 1 double_crochet in front loop only in the next 5 stitches and increase on the 6th stitch slip_stitch top of chain 2 to join round 11 chain 2 add 1 double_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch top of chain 2 to join round 12 chain 2 add another double_crochet into the same stich the chain is in then a single_crochet in the next 6 stitches then 2 double_crochet in the 7th stitch increase 6 single_crochet in each stitch and then increase 2dc in the 7th repeat around slip_stitch top of chain 2 to join round 13 chain 2 do not count as a stitch and double_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch top of first chain 2 to join round 14 finishing row chain 1 single_crochet or half_double_crochet for a longer brim in each stitch around fasten_off leaving a long tail weave in the end using a tapestry needle you re done block the hat if desired especially if using cotton yarn enjoy your handmade bucket hat be sure to tag me in your finished product on social media tik tok @thethreadedcollective instagram @threadedcollectivebyjosh youtube
